ActJudges Act
SubjectHelene M. Harvey ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. R. Bruce Harvey **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to HELENE M. HARVEY, widow of the Hon. R. Bruce Harvey, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective November 25, 2015.
